sentences: Jazmine Marie Sullivan (born April 9, 1987) is an American singer-songwriter.
section: N/A

sentences: Born and raised in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, her debut album, Fearless, was released in 2008 to commercial and critical success.
section: N/A

sentences: The record topped Billboard's Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums chart and was certified gold by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA).
section: N/A

sentences: It spawned four singles, including "Need U Bad" and "Bust Your Windows", both of which peaked in the top 40 of the Billboard Hot 100 chart and the former of which became Sullivan's first and only number one on the Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs chart.
section: N/A

sentences: Sullivan followed this with her second studio album, Love Me Back, in 2010, which was received favorably by critics.
section: N/A

sentences: After taking a three-year break, Sullivan signed with RCA Records and released her first studio album under the label, Reality Show, in 2015, and it became her second album to peak at number one on the Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums chart.
section: N/A

sentences: In 2021, she released her critically acclaimed first EP, Heaux Tales, which spawned the single "Pick Up Your Feelings".
section: N/A

sentences: Sullivan has received one Billboard Women in Music Award, two Soul Train Music Awards and two BET Awards over the course of her career.
section: N/A

sentences: She has also received 15 Grammy nominations, tying with Björk as the female artist with the most Grammy nominations without winning.

== Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: Musical style and artistry
section: == Musical style and artistry ==
== Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: Sonically, Sullivan's voice alternates between "modern productions" and a "1980s-influenced sound" which music critics say gives her "old-school hip hop sound".
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: Her voice type is contralto.
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: Her voice has a solid agility in all registers and is well connected between an A2 and a G5.
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: InStyle said that she has a "raspy voice".
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: She describes her writing style as "flashbacks", in reference to her songs about failed relationships that were both physically and emotionally abusive.
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: Her music displays her responses to these relationships famously with her song "Bust Your Windows".
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: She likes to write about how she is feeling, which in turn, taking a day or up to a month to complete.
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: During the recording of the album Reality Show, Sullivan spent so much time revising and re-recording, that the producers had to force her to release the album to prevent a delayed release.
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: Sullivan is well known for writing her own songs which amplifies her universal critical acclaim from critics and fans.
section: == Musical style and artistry ==

sentences: Sullivan's song "Bust Your Windows" was listed at number 137 on National Public Radio's list of The 200 Greatest Songs By 21st Century Women.
section: == Musical style and artistry ==
